page.title: 17RECREATION - KILMERSDON AREA
page.content: Gardening as a hobby is very popular in the locality. The W I Produce Show in September is testamony enough to the high standard in both flower and vegetable growing. Two vineyards at Charlton produced l,500 bottles of wine in l984 from the Seyve Villard, Madeleine Angevin and Seibel varieties of grape. Other outdoor activities include shooting, riding, bee keeping, rambling and breeding Siberian Huskies. Several leagues of skittles and darts are played throughout the year at the Jolliffe Arms. Bell ringing is becoming increasingly more popular especially with the teenagers. The Church has a ring of 6. The youngsters also combine pleasure and profit with sponsored walking, cyling and swimming for charity.
